column2: ??We are looking for a smart Business Development Executive (Female) who has the capability to think out of the box, is computer savvy, has ability to sell on the phone. People with prior knowledge of Corporate Travel preferred. The applicant must be Graduate/ MBA from reputed college, have at least 2 years of work experience in TeleSales, and Hospitality industry and ability to spot opportunities and close the deals. Your responsibility will be to develop and implement the business plan and strategy that will deliver new and increased revenue contribution. Salary to commensurate with experience. ??,250317500015.0,2017-03-25,2017-06-23,EducationalOccupationalCredential,24.0,Sales & Business Development,Field Sales Executive,Travel & Tourism,executive
